content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Farhad Abbasi from Iran.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for the apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final agreed price was 600 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate my satisfaction with the outcome as a 9. I believe 600 euros per month is a fair price for the apartment, given its location and facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt
